ComicInfo.Summary:
The women of GLOW are preparing for an all-new sort of a foe... a news anchor! As they learn the art of the promo to convince the media that GLOW isn't a bad influence on children, they discover a much bigger problem-a runaway who's been living under the ring!
Written by actress Aimee Garcia (Lucifer, Dexter) and former WWE superstar and New York Times bestselling author AJ Mendez (Crazy is My Superpower)!
